plot outline: Venu (Venu Thottempudi)) is a Vizag hotel receptionist. Nirmala (Ashima Bhalla) is loved by Venu and their relationship is approved by the family of Nirmala. Ramji later, with luxurious items, begins to help Nirmala and forces Nirmala to accept the proposal of Ramji. Subsequently, Venu meets Radha (Abhirami) By then, Ramji cheats Nirmala The rest of how Venu rejects Nirmala and marries Radha.
title: Cheppave Chirugali
plot: Venu, a sweet boy, works as a receptionist at a lodge by the beach. He is kind, gentle and tolerant, ever willing to take blows for his loved ones.

Venu (Venu Thottempudi)) is a Vizag hotel receptionist. Nirmala (Ashima Bhalla) is loved by Venu and their relationship is approved by the family of Nirmala. Ramji later, with luxurious items, begins to help Nirmala and forces Nirmala to accept the proposal of Ramji. Subsequently, Venu meets Radha (Abhirami) By then, Ramji cheats Nirmala The rest of how Venu rejects Nirmala and marries Radha.
